Cart.text: Check adding a single product to the cart from product page.
Check adding multiple products to the cart from different pages.
Check quantity update (max/min limits and invalid inputs).
Check removing a single product from the cart.
Check correct calculation of subtotal, taxes, shipping, and total.
Check applying discount codes or promo codes.
Check cart retention after page refresh.
Check cart retention after logout/login (for registered users).
Check stock validation: cannot add more items than available.
Check checkout button redirects to correct checkout page.
Check responsive design on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Check cart updates correctly when removing or adding products during checkout.
Check behavior when session expires with items in the cart.
Check performance: cart updates and page load time.

Register.text: Check password minimum requirements (length, uppercase, special characters).
Check email format validation (invalid email addresses).
Check email uniqueness (registration with an existing user's email).
Check automatic login/redirect to the main page after successful registration.
Check password confirmation matches password field.
Check terms and conditions checkbox is mandatory before registration.
Check registration via social login options (Google, Facebook, etc.).
Check validation messages are displayed properly for each invalid input.
Check CAPTCHA functionality if available during registration.
Check email verification link is sent and works correctly.
Check registration form is responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Check form handles special characters in name fields correctly.
Check error handling when server is down or slow during registration.

Authorization.text: Check login with empty fields (email/username and password).
Check the 'Remember Me' functionality keeps the user logged in after browser close.
Check 'Forgot Password' functionality sends reset email correctly.
Check login with social accounts (Google, Facebook, etc.) if available.
Check account lockout after multiple failed login attempts.
Check password visibility toggle (show/hide password) works correctly.
Check error messages are displayed correctly for invalid login attempts.
Check login page is responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Check user is redirected to the correct page after login (home/dashboard).
Check logout functionality works and session is destroyed.
Check session expires after a certain inactivity period.

Search.text: Verify that the search box is present and visible on all relevant pages.
Check that placeholder text is correct in the search input.
Verify user can type input into the search field.
Verify search can be triggered by pressing the Enter key.
Verify search can be triggered by clicking the search button/icon.
Test search with a valid single keyword and check results are relevant.
Test search with multiple words (phrases) and check results.
Test search with special characters (e.g. “C++”, “&”, “#”).
Test search with numeric input (e.g. model names, years).
Test search with leading/trailing whitespace and verify trimming behavior.
Test search with mixed case (uppercase/lowercase) and ensure case insensitivity works.
Verify autocomplete or suggestion dropdown appears (if implemented).
Verify suggestions in autocomplete are relevant to input.
Test search with a misspelled word and check for “Did you mean” suggestions.
Check search result relevance ranking (most relevant first).
Verify pagination of search results (if there are many results).
Verify filters or facets (e.g., category, price) work with search results (for e‑commerce).
Check performance: measure response time for issuing a search query.
Test no-results scenario: search for something that has no matches and verify proper message.
Verify that search history is stored / displayed (if the feature exists).
Test the maximum length of input allowed in the search box.
Check behavior when entering very long search strings.
Check cross-browser compatibility for search functionality.
Test localization: search with input in different languages / character sets.
Verify security: search input should not allow injection (SQL, script, etc.).
Verify UI and usability: search box is responsive on mobile / tablet / desktop.
Check that clicking a search result navigates to the correct page / product.
Verify that search suggestions / history can be cleared or deleted (if allowed).

Sort.text: Verify sorting options (e.g., Price Low to High, Price High to Low, Newest, Popular) are visible.
Check that default sorting is applied correctly on page load.
Verify sorting by price (Low to High) displays items in correct order.
Verify sorting by price (High to Low) displays items in correct order.
Verify sorting by newest arrivals displays latest items first.
Verify sorting by popularity displays items correctly.
Check sorting works correctly with filters applied.
Check sorting works correctly after a search query.
Verify that changing the sort option updates the results immediately or after applying.
Check sorting works correctly with paginated results.
Verify sorting UI is responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Verify correct handling of items with the same value in the sorting criteria (e.g., same price).
Check that sorting persists when navigating back and forth on the page.
Verify sorting works correctly when multiple criteria are selected (if multi-sort is allowed).
Verify that invalid or unsupported sort options are handled gracefully.

Filter.text: Verify all available filters (e.g., category, price, brand, rating) are visible.
Check that filters can be selected individually and display correct results.
Check that multiple filters can be applied simultaneously and results update correctly.
Verify clearing a single filter updates results correctly.
Verify clearing all filters resets results to default view.
Check filter options reflect available items (e.g., no empty results when filter selected).
Verify that filter selections are retained when navigating between pages (pagination).
Check filter selections are retained after page refresh (if required).
Check that filter labels and values are displayed correctly.
Check price range filters allow selecting min/max values correctly.
Verify color, size, or other attribute filters update results correctly.
Check filters work correctly in combination with sorting.
Check filters work correctly in combination with search queries.
Verify UI responsiveness of filter options on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Verify edge cases: filters return no results and display appropriate message.
Check performance: applying filters updates results quickly.
Verify that filters do not allow invalid selections or values.

ContactUs.text: Verify the Contact Us form is accessible from all relevant pages.
Check all required fields are present: Name, Email, Subject, Message, etc.
Verify mandatory field validation: submitting empty fields shows error messages.
Check email field validation (invalid email formats are rejected).
Verify that special characters are allowed/handled correctly in Name and Message fields.
Check maximum character limits for each input field.
Verify that the Submit button sends the form successfully when inputs are valid.
Check confirmation message appears after successful submission.
Check that submitting the form triggers email notification to admin (if implemented).
Verify reset/clear button works correctly (if present).
Check UI responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Check error handling when server is down or network fails during submission.
Verify that form prevents SQL injection or script injection attempts.
Check accessibility features: labels, tab navigation, screen readers.

Subscribe.text: Verify the subscription input field is visible and accessible.
Check placeholder text in the subscription input is correct.
Verify that user can type a valid email into the subscription field.
Check mandatory field validation: empty email field shows an error.
Verify email format validation: invalid email addresses are rejected.
Check that the Subscribe button is clickable and triggers subscription.
Verify successful subscription shows a confirmation message.
Check that duplicate subscriptions (same email) are handled correctly.
Verify email is added to the subscription database/list.
Check unsubscription or opt-out link works correctly (if applicable).
Verify UI responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Check security: prevent script injection via the email input field.
Verify confirmation email is sent (if system sends one).
Check error handling when the server is down or network fails.

Navigation.text: Verify main navigation menu is visible on all pages.
Check all menu items are clickable and redirect to correct pages.
Verify dropdown menus open on hover or click as expected.
Check that active page/menu item is highlighted correctly.
Verify breadcrumb navigation is visible and correct (if implemented).
Check mobile menu (hamburger) opens and closes correctly.
Verify menu items are accessible via keyboard navigation (Tab key).
Check responsive design: menu displays properly on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Verify navigation links work correctly after page refresh.
Check that broken links in navigation are not present.
Verify external links (if any) open in new tabs/windows as expected.
Check navigation works correctly in different browsers.
Verify search icon/navigation shortcuts (if present) function correctly.
Check user role-based navigation (if applicable) displays correct menu items.
Verify sticky navigation (if implemented) remains visible while scrolling.

ResponsiveDesign.text: Verify that the website layout adjusts correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Check that all images resize properly without distortion on different screen sizes.
Verify navigation menus adapt correctly (e.g., hamburger menu on mobile).
Check that buttons and clickable elements are easily tappable on mobile devices.
Verify text content is readable without horizontal scrolling on all screen sizes.
Check that forms (input fields, checkboxes, dropdowns) display correctly and are usable.
Verify that modals, pop-ups, and tooltips are displayed correctly on all devices.
Check responsiveness of tables, lists, and grids.
Verify responsive images and media queries work correctly.
Check that footer and header elements remain visible and properly aligned.
Verify that interactive elements (sliders, carousels) work correctly on touch devices.
Check font sizes and line spacing are readable on small screens.
Verify that the website does not break in portrait and landscape orientations.
Check responsive behavior on different browsers and operating systems.
Verify performance and loading speed remain acceptable on mobile devices.

BrowserCompatibility.text: Verify the website loads correctly in Google Chrome (latest version).
Verify the website loads correctly in Mozilla Firefox (latest version).
Verify the website loads correctly in Microsoft Edge (latest version).
Verify the website loads correctly in Safari (latest version, macOS/iOS).
Verify the website loads correctly in Opera (latest version).
Check that all UI elements render consistently across browsers.
Verify that interactive elements (buttons, links, forms) work correctly in all browsers.
Check that responsive design behaves consistently in all browsers.
Verify that images, icons, and fonts display correctly in all browsers.
Check that JavaScript functionalities (sliders, pop-ups, modals) work in all browsers.
Verify that CSS styles are applied consistently across browsers.
Check compatibility with older versions of major browsers if required.
Verify that external plugins (if any) work in all browsers.
Check performance and loading speed in different browsers.
Verify that error messages and notifications display consistently across browsers.

Accessibility.text: Verify all images have appropriate alt text for screen readers.
Check that all form fields have proper labels associated.
Verify keyboard navigation works for all interactive elements (links, buttons, forms).
Check that focus indicators are visible when navigating with keyboard.
Verify color contrast ratios meet WCAG standards for readability.
Check that ARIA roles, properties, and landmarks are implemented correctly.
Verify that skip-to-content links are available and functional.
Check that dynamic content updates are announced to screen readers.
Verify headings (h1-h6) are used correctly and in proper hierarchy.
Check that videos have captions or transcripts available.
Verify that interactive elements are accessible via assistive technologies.
Check that text can be resized up to 200% without loss of content or functionality.
Verify that error messages are descriptive and programmatically associated with fields.
Check that no content is blinking or flashing in a way that could trigger seizures.
Verify the website meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards.

Usability.text: Verify that the website layout is intuitive and easy to navigate.
Check that menus, links, and buttons are clearly labeled and understandable.
Verify that important actions (e.g., checkout, registration) are easy to find.
Check consistency of design elements (colors, fonts, button styles) across pages.
Verify that forms have clear instructions and field labels.
Check that error messages are clear, informative, and actionable.
Verify that page loading time is acceptable and does not frustrate users.
Check that important content is visible without excessive scrolling.
Verify that navigation flow is logical and supports user tasks efficiently.
Check that interactive elements provide feedback when clicked or hovered.
Verify that call-to-action buttons are prominent and stand out.
Check that instructions, labels, and messages use simple, understandable language.
Verify that users can easily recover from mistakes (undo, edit, delete).
Check that frequently used features are easy to access and use.
Verify usability across devices: desktop, tablet, and mobile.

Performance.text: Verify page load times are within acceptable limits (e.g., < 3 seconds).
Check website performance under normal user load.
Check website performance under peak/high user load (stress testing).
Verify response times for key actions: search, add to cart, checkout, login.
Check database queries do not cause slowdowns.
Verify caching mechanisms work correctly to improve load times.
Check server response time for static and dynamic content.
Verify performance on different browsers and devices.
Check image and media optimization to reduce page load time.
Verify third-party scripts do not significantly affect performance.
Check page rendering performance during simultaneous user actions.
Verify scalability: website can handle increasing number of users or requests.
Check performance during large data uploads or downloads (if applicable).
Verify network latency and bandwidth handling for different connection speeds.
Check for memory leaks or performance degradation over extended use.

UI.text: Verify that layout and alignment of all elements are consistent across pages.
Check that fonts, font sizes, and styles are consistent and readable.
Verify that colors, backgrounds, and themes match design specifications.
Check that images, icons, and logos are displayed correctly and are not distorted.
Verify that buttons, links, and interactive elements are styled consistently.
Check hover, click, and focus states for buttons and links.
Verify spacing and padding between elements are consistent.
Check visibility and readability of text over backgrounds.
Verify alignment and positioning of elements on different screen sizes.
Check that modals, pop-ups, and tooltips appear correctly and are positioned properly.
Verify UI components are responsive and adapt to mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Check consistency of UI elements with the design mockups or style guide.
Verify that icons and buttons are intuitive and clearly represent their functions.
Check that scrollbars, tabs, and menus behave correctly and are visible when needed.
Verify that error, success, and information messages are displayed clearly and consistently.
